room_title: Escape room "Cuban Crisis" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
room_address: 2797 S Maryland Pkwy Las Vegas, NV 89109
room_description: While on a classified mission for the CIA, you infiltrate Fidel Castro's palace to find the secret KGB lair. Your informant tells you that Castro is headed home and will arrive in 60 minutes. You have to avoid seeing him and complete your assignment in time - gather intel on the KGB!
